projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Android: include is much slower than on iOS

comments.body: Tested this issue. The times were much better.
A number of performance improvements in 1.8.0.1 and 2.0.1 releases have resolved this issue.

Working fine now with much lesser time difference -
On iPhone 4S iOS 5.0.1 - Average time around 920ms
On Samsung GALAXY Note Android 2.3.6 - Average time around 1300ms
Environment used for verification -
Tested with Titanium SDK: 2.2.0.v20120828153312
Tested with Titanium Â Studio: 2.1.2.201208201549
Device - iPhone 4S iOS 5.0.1,Samsung GALAXY Note Android 2.3.6
Machine OS - MAC 10.8
